# .github

Houses all configs relevant to GitHub such as Action workflows, CODEOWNERS, PR templates, etc.

## Useful links

- [Actions Syntax](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/writing-workflows/workflow-syntax-for-github-actions)
- [Reusable Workflows](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/sharing-automations/reusing-workflows)
- [Composite Aciton](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/sharing-automations/creating-actions/creating-a-composite-action)
- [Workflow contexts](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/writing-workflows/choosing-what-your-workflow-does/accessing-contextual-information-about-workflow-runs)
- [Expressions](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/writing-workflows/choosing-what-your-workflow-does/evaluate-expressions-in-workflows-and-actions)
